review: Best purchase!  No stopping, no buffering, better picture and the price is right!  Love it!

review: Awesome product.  Works great, no streaming issues.  Can now access any of my streaming subscriptions on any TV in the house.

review: Love it. My kids love watching shows and playing the games.
